FuncDef: The display bgp evpn update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups of BGP EVPN routes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: The EVPN instance's update peer group number : 1
Keep buffer update peer group number : 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used to view information about the update peer-group in the BGP-EVPN address family.
